title: Patterson Office Tower
name: Patterson Office Tower
description:
On the same day that students staged a sit-in of the President's office, another group of students took over the Board of Trustees meeting to demand the university begin implementing policies to preven the purchase of apparel produced in sweatshops. The invasion was meant as street theatre rather than a space for negotiation, and the students were quicly escorted out, chanting.

The Office Tower is generally open to students, but is locked down during Board of Trustees meetings, during which budgeting, policy, and operational decisions are often made.
